channel.title: RS - Prestige
channel.description:
I saw it coming when I saw the 718's have it... and it appears it will be arriving...
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/dev-blog---prestige
this may draw the line for me right here. I love the game but I have put too much time into my ranking to lose it now.

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Prestige will not be added to the game after the results of the most recent poll. Read it on RS website

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I don’t like how you can revert back to your 99 at any point you want. It should be more like Call of Duty 4, where once you prestige you can’t get your precious P90 back until you level up for it again.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:33, topic:533948”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=652745.msg4375162#msg4375162 date=1381870160]
it says you can toggle the prestige on and off to restore your 99s. if you have 180M xp and you prestige, you now have 0 prestige xp and 180M unprestiged. there’s no need to take that xp and automatically give someone 5th prestige or so.

the people who took time to go for 200M xp are not losing anything by prestiging. they will keep their mass amount of experience and stay ranked highly on default high scores, and also be ranked higher upon the prestige high scores.

unless I misunderstood it where the prestige will display above anyone with 200m xp FIRST, that’s dumb.
[/quote]
You can’t train your 180m after you have prestiged.[/quote]you can toggle the prestige on and off from what the original post on the runescape site said.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:32, topic:533948”]it says you can toggle the prestige on and off to restore your 99s. if you have 180M xp and you prestige, you now have 0 prestige xp and 180M unprestiged. there’s no need to take that xp and automatically give someone 5th prestige or so.

the people who took time to go for 200M xp are not losing anything by prestiging. they will keep their mass amount of experience and stay ranked highly on default high scores, and also be ranked higher upon the prestige high scores.

unless I misunderstood it where the prestige will display above anyone with 200m xp FIRST, that’s dumb.[/quote]
You can’t train your 180m after you have prestiged.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

it says you can toggle the prestige on and off to restore your 99s. if you have 180M xp and you prestige, you now have 0 prestige xp and 180M unprestiged. there’s no need to take that xp and automatically give someone 5th prestige or so.

the people who took time to go for 200M xp are not losing anything by prestiging. they will keep their mass amount of experience and stay ranked highly on default high scores, and also be ranked higher upon the prestige high scores.

unless I misunderstood it where the prestige will display above anyone with 200m xp FIRST, that’s dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I don’t see why this changes anything if you could keep exp to roll over for you guys that like having rank 500 or whatever. If you prestige and your exp rolled over for the next prestige and everyone else prestiged you would be at the same rank. Only difference is at a different level. I personally love this update, but if they do the roll over thing then I may not prestige because I don’t have the time to grind to be even slightly competitive.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:18, topic:533948”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=652745.msg4373952#msg4373952 date=1381534940]

I’m personally going to prestige slayer and keep my 99 stats that way I can train slayer at a faster rate than if someone prestiged everything. I feel people going for overall rankings are going to prestige everything at once and not have a lot of hindsight haha.

Yeah, I kinda feel that you’d have to be nuts to prestige combat before non-combat.
[/quote]You can ‘unprestige’ to get your 99 back (like for example to get 99 combats back to train slayer), you just cant get XP in the prestiged skill.

EDIT - I like this update, I dont really see the downside to it except that people that dont play as much feel like they are falling even further behind.[/quote]
This wonders me…
People who are at around let’s say… like 150mxp attack but wants to get 200mxp, and they prestige, they can’t train that 150m anymore… Ridiculous eh?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Tutorial:

I haven’t read up too much on this topic, but does anyone know how Dungeoneering prestige will be done?

Same way the other skills will be done. Reset your DG back to 1 you now only have level 1 floors available.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Lothy:

You say that as if the game will be around long enough for anyone to come close to achieving that. Going from 13 prestige to 14 prestige, leveling the skill from 1 to 85, will take almost 49m experience. And of course, this only happens after the 13 prestige levels that come before it.

To get prestige 14 level 99 prayer with frost dragon bones it would cost 39.55b gp and take 1,564 hours which is not a lot compared to how much time S U O M I has spent. S U O M I played on average 16 hours a day so that would only take him 97.75 days. And before you say people don’t have 39.55b, a player named M d 3 w was banned recently with over 200b gp.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

S u o m i and other guys got 1bill exp just off effigies… they should bring them back with this update.

Read full topic

Stupid.

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:20, topic:533948”]lol…

with the xp cap still remaining at 200M, this limits prestige to only 14…[/quote]
You say that as if the game will be around long enough for anyone to come close to achieving that. Going from 13 prestige to 14 prestige, leveling the skill from 1 to 85, will take almost 49m experience. And of course, this only happens after the 13 prestige levels that come before it.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

lol…

with the xp cap still remaining at 200M, this limits prestige to only 14…

99x00 || 13,034,431
99x01 || 26,068,862
99x02 || 39,103,293
99x03 || 52,137,724
99x04 || 65,172,155
99x05 || 78,206,586
99x06 || 91,241,017
99x07 || 104,275,448
99x08 || 117,309,879
99x09 || 130,344,310
99x10 || 143,378,741
99x11 || 156,413,172
99x12 || 169,337,603
99x13 || 182,482,034
99x14 || 195,516,465

99x15 || 208,550,896

this equals a total of 1,564,021,720 xp required to reach the 14th prestige’s 99.

having 26 total skills, will result in a total of 40,664,564,720 xp to fully comp prestige 14.

this is going to help and hurt the game in many ways, one harm being giving bots a live community to sell resources to again, one plus being, getting rid of a vast amount of money + sole items, and reintroducing more of secondary items (removing more herbs, introducing more potions etc.

bonds may be hurting the goldselling business, but now bots will be back to make money off the items again. as we can only guess that these first items (essence, herbs, vials of water, ores, bars, logs, fish, etc will all go up rapidly in the next few months (everyone can go ahead and start bulking even more)

good luck jagx

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I wondering if when they implement this, any xp earned past 99 will count towards prestiged skills, since they said 200M will still remain as the max. If this were the case, and every prestiged 99 required the experience of one 99 plus every one before it, 200M xp would essentially be Lv 99 Prestige 5.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:16, topic:533948”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=652745.msg4373732#msg4373732 date=1381495472]
I’m personally going to prestige slayer and keep my 99 stats that way I can train slayer at a faster rate than if someone prestiged everything. I feel people going for overall rankings are going to prestige everything at once and not have a lot of hindsight haha.
[/quote]
Yeah, I kinda feel that you’d have to be nuts to prestige combat before non-combat.[/quote]You can ‘unprestige’ to get your 99 back (like for example to get 99 combats back to train slayer), you just cant get XP in the prestiged skill.

EDIT - I like this update, I dont really see the downside to it except that people that dont play as much feel like they are falling even further behind.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

I’ve been playing RuneScape for a long time and I haven’t got a single 99 because I’m lazy af and can’t be bothered to ‘compete’ with other players. I think this prestige system is the most retarded thing since EOC, realistically who checks the hi-scores nowadays? I personally think once you’ve spent all that time gaining the XP you should stick with it not have it reset simply because you want to be on ‘top’. The better your level in a certain skill the better you’re going to get e.g. higher fishing level > better fish > better value. I know the aspect of skilling being a money source was lost along time ago but you know…

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:

The Wanderer:

I’m personally going to prestige slayer and keep my 99 stats that way I can train slayer at a faster rate than if someone prestiged everything. I feel people going for overall rankings are going to prestige everything at once and not have a lot of hindsight haha.

Yeah, I kinda feel that you’d have to be nuts to prestige combat before non-combat.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Prestige
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:2, topic:533948”]I welcome this update and plan to prestige a few of my skills. For people considering quitting over this update due to losing their ranks…who the hell cares? If you weren’t in the top 100 or so you have nothing to be proud about.[/quote]THANKFULLY they aren’t going to do minigames at the moment as I am ranked 123 in fist of guthix…

but they have mentioned that they may get rid of that. I am also ranked like in the top 5k in prayer so…yeah I don’t want to lose my ranks cause of some noob who has barely reached the xp requirement just cause he prestiged > > People like myself have worked extremely hard on their ranks. I have a friend who is ranked in the top 150 in firemaking/ top 550 of crafting as well so I totally feel his pain.

Read full topic
